europeana:record.dc:title: On two new species of Oswaldella Stechow, 1919: O. terranovae spec. nov. and O. tottoni spec. nov. (Cnidaria: Hydrozoa). Notes on Antarctic hydroids, III
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Peña Cantero A.L.
Vervoort W.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Porifera, Coelenterata, Echinodermata, Brachyopoda
Cnidaria; Hydrozoa; hydroids; Oswaldella; new species; Antarctic
europeana:record.dc:description: The material assigned by Totton (1930) to Oswaldella antarctica (Jaderholm, 1904) and O. bifurca (Hartlaub, 1904) has been re-examined and redescribed. This material shows such important differences with Hartlaub's and Jäderholm's species and the remaining species of Oswaldella that they are here considered as two new species: O. terranovae spec. nov. and O. tottoni spec, nov., respectively.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: On two new species of Oswaldella Stechow, 1919: O. terranovae spec. nov. and O. tottoni spec. nov. (Cnidaria: Hydrozoa). Notes on Antarctic hydroids, III (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 70) (Issue 8)
